JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Description:-      5 to 9 yrs of software development experience   Solid grounding in Computer Science fundamentals and object-oriented programming and design   Expert-level knowledge of C++ or Java   Willingness and ability to work across layer of the software stack   Exposure to at least one of the following lower layer areas: - Memory management , Threading   Good to have experience in Android TV/ Smart TV   Experience in large, complex embedded systems applications   Increasing areas of ownership and responsibility on previous projects    Nice to Have:    Capacity to excel in a fast-paced, dynamic environment   Collaborative attitude, focus on working together on strong teams to deliver the best products   Prior experience with SCRUM/Agile a plus     Education     Computer Science Engineering Graduation degree or post-graduation degree from reputed Indian or foreign university   Experience in the industry
